rules_text:
Pay one score counter: Untap Chest of Desires.
{2}, {T}: Create a 2/2 colorless Spirit creature token.
{4}, {T}: Search your library for a card, shuffle, then put that card on top of your library.
notes:
T: Put an artifact or creature card with mana value 3 or less from your hand on to the battlefield.

T: Return target artifact or creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
